ValidationRule.description: Industry values must match one of the values from the available picklist options. Currently using ZoomInfo's primary Industry taxonomy.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Agriculture"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Business Services"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Construction"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Consumer Services"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Education"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Energy, Utilities & Waste"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Finance"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Government"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Healthcare Services"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Holding Companies & Conglomerates"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Hospitality"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Hospitals & Physicians Clinics"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Insurance"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Law Firms & Legal Services"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Manufacturing"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Media & Internet"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Minerals & Mining"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Organizations"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Pharmaceuticals"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Real Estate"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Retail"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Software"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Telecommunications"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Transportation"), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Industry values must match one of the values from the available picklist options.
